title: Max Verstappen & Sergio Perez, Kyrie Opts In & Mt Rushmore Of America With Kate
description:
Kyrie has opted in ending the dumbest 2 days on nba twitter. Does John Wall have dog in him and what type of dog is it? (00:03:05-00:20:27) Hot Seat/Cool Throne including talking tennis. (00:21:47-00:40:00) Red Bull F1 Drivers Max Verstappen and Sergio Perez join the show to talk about the season, Max not being on Drive to Survive, Sergioâ€™s golfing and tons more. (00:41:18-01:04:06) We finish with the Mt Rushmore of America with our favorite marine, Kate. (01:05:20-01:38:51)
